import{Percent}from'@uniswap/sdk-core';import{Trade as V2Trade}from'@uniswap/v2-sdk';import{useMemo}from'react';import{useUserSlippageToleranceWithDefault}from'../state/user/hooks';import{useActiveWeb3React}from'./web3';import{L2_CHAIN_IDS}from'constants/chains';var V2_SWAP_DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE=new Percent(50,10000);// .50%
var V3_SWAP_DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE=new Percent(50,10000);// .50%
var ONE_TENTHS_PERCENT=new Percent(10,10000);// .10%
export default function useSwapSlippageTolerance(trade){var _useActiveWeb3React=useActiveWeb3React(),chainId=_useActiveWeb3React.chainId;var onL2=chainId&&L2_CHAIN_IDS.includes(chainId);var defaultSlippageTolerance=useMemo(function(){if(!trade||onL2)return ONE_TENTHS_PERCENT;if(trade instanceof V2Trade)return V2_SWAP_DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE;return V3_SWAP_DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE;},[onL2,trade]);return useUserSlippageToleranceWithDefault(defaultSlippageTolerance);}
